files.description: Defines the override configuration schema and validation utilities used across YAML loading, example generation, and application.

errors.detail:
FILE_WRITTEN:src/overrides/schema.py
DIR_STATE:["src/overrides/schema.py"]
SUMMARY: Added a dependency-free overrides schema module with path parsing and strict document/item validation producing a canonical normalized structure.

FILE_WRITTEN:src/overrides/schema.py
DIR_STATE:["src/overrides/schema.py"]
SUMMARY: Added a compact overrides schema plus path parsing, normalization, and validation utilities for use by YAML IO, example generation, and application.

files.description: Provides YAML load/dump helpers with consistent parsing options, error reporting, and round-trip-friendly behavior for overrides files.

errors.detail:
FILE_WRITTEN:src/overrides/yaml_support.py
DIR_STATE:["src/overrides/schema.py", "src/overrides/yaml_support.py"]
YAML load/dump helpers were added with consistent options, duplicate-key checks, and path/line-aware error messages with ruamel.yaml support when available.

FILE_WRITTEN:src/overrides/yaml_support.py
DIR_STATE:["src/overrides/schema.py", "src/overrides/yaml_support.py"]
This stage produced a compact YAML load/dump helper module with consistent options and structured error reporting.

files.description: Generates a canonical example overrides YAML document from the schema, including comments and defaults for user guidance.

errors.detail:
FILE_WRITTEN:src/overrides/overrides_example_yaml.py
DIR_STATE:["src/overrides/overrides_example_yaml.py", "src/overrides/schema.py", "src/overrides/yaml_support.py"]
Wrote a reusable example-YAML generator that derives defaults and descriptions from a JSON-schema-like overrides schema and emits commented YAML with ruamel.yaml when available.

FILE_WRITTEN:src/overrides/overrides_example_yaml.py
DIR_STATE:["src/overrides/overrides_example_yaml.py", "src/overrides/schema.py", "src/overrides/yaml_support.py"]
SUMMARY: Added a schema-driven example overrides YAML generator with deterministic output, optional comments, and a small CLI entrypoint.

files.description: Implements the core override-application engine that merges validated overrides into target data structures deterministically.

FILE_WRITTEN:src/overrides/apply.py
DIR_STATE:["src/overrides/apply.py", "src/overrides/overrides_example_yaml.py", "src/overrides/schema.py", "src/overrides/yaml_support.py"]
SUMMARY: Implemented a deterministic, path-based override application engine supporting set/merge/delete and basic list operations with strict/non-strict modes.
